message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to go lower than $12,500.  This product is valuable to me, and I'm confident it's worth this price to you as well.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand Alice, but I still can't justify spending more than $12,000 on this product. I would like to stick to my original offer of $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
